entries.name: base_uri
entries.desc: returns a URI that is the base of relative URIs in the data. It may differ from the URI supplied by a user due to redirection.

entries.name: meta
entries.desc: returns a Hash that represents header fields. The Hash keys are downcased for canonicalization. The Hash values are a field body. If there are multiple field with same field name, the field values are concatenated with a comma.

entries.name: metas
entries.desc: returns a Hash that represents header fields. The Hash keys are downcased for canonicalization. The Hash value are an array of field values.

entries.name: status
entries.desc: returns an Array that consists of status code and message.

entries.name: charset()
entries.desc: returns a charset parameter in Content-Type field. It is downcased for canonicalization.

entries.name: content_encoding()
entries.desc: Returns a list of encodings in Content-Encoding field as an array of strings.

entries.name: content_type()
entries.desc: returns “type/subtype” which is MIME Content-Type. It is downcased for canonicalization. Content-Type parameters are stripped.

entries.name: last_modified()
entries.desc: returns a Time that represents the Last-Modified field.
